sentences.sContent: Groves of stunted red spruce, huckleberry, blueberry, mountain laurel, mountain holly, speckled alder, and cranberry bogs, show combinations of colors throughout the year.
sentences.sContent_eng: Groves of stunted red spruce, huckleberry, blueberry, mountain laurel, mountain holly, speckled alder, and cranberry bogs, show combinations of colors throughout the year.
sentences.sCn: 发育不良云杉的小树林、黑果木、蓝莓、山月桂、山冬青，斑点桤木和种越橘的沼泽地，显示着全年各种颜色的组合。

sentences.sContent: I have watered the red huckleberry, the sand cherry and the nettle-tree, the red pine and the black ash, the white grape and the yellow violet, which might have withered else in dry seasons.
sentences.sContent_eng: I have watered the red huckleberry, the sand cherry and the nettle-tree, the red pine and the black ash, the white grape and the yellow violet, which might have withered else in dry seasons.
sentences.sCn: 我还浇灌红色的越橘树、沙色的樱桃树和荨麻树、红色的松树和黑色的白蜡树，还有白色的葡萄树和枯黄的紫罗兰，不然它们会在干旱的季节里枯萎的。

trans.tranOther: any American ericaceous shrub of the genus Gaylussacia, having edible dark blue berries with large seeds
